dt: {bc}the arrangement, proportioning, and design of windows and doors in a building
{bc}an opening in a surface (such as a wall or membrane)
{bc}the operation of cutting an opening in the bony labyrinth between the inner ear and tympanum to replace natural {a_link|fenestrae} that are not functional

shortdef: the arrangement, proportioning, and design of windows and doors in a building
an opening in a surface (such as a wall or membrane)
